response: "Why can't I just be myself? Society's expectations are suffocating me."
"I feel like I'm constantly under a microscope, every flaw magnified and judged."
"Am I even allowed to make mistakes? It feels like one misstep and I'm labeled a failure."
"I can't keep up with this relentless pursuit of perfection. It's driving me insane."
"I don't know who I am anymore. I'm lost in this maze of societal expectations."
